Uses of Class
de.tudarmstadt.ukp.clarin.webanno.model.SourceDocument

  • Packages that use SourceDocument 
    Package Description
    de.tudarmstadt.ukp.clarin.webanno.api
    Provides Interfaces for different dao method implementations.
    de.tudarmstadt.ukp.clarin.webanno.api.dao
    Provides Implementations of the RepositoryService and AnnotationService Interfaces
    de.tudarmstadt.ukp.clarin.webanno.brat.annotation
    Provides a wicket component for the BRAT specific implementations.
    de.tudarmstadt.ukp.clarin.webanno.brat.controller
    Provides Classes that cumpute brat specific operations such as de.tudarmstadt.ukp.clarin.webanno.brat.controller.BratAjaxCasController#getDocumentResponse(String, String)....
    de.tudarmstadt.ukp.clarin.webanno.brat.curation.component.model
    Model classes for curation/correction related components
    de.tudarmstadt.ukp.clarin.webanno.brat.project
    Support for project definition such as checking appropriate project name, if a user is a project admin and so on
    de.tudarmstadt.ukp.clarin.webanno.brat.util
    Utility classes for brat annotation/curation/correction
    de.tudarmstadt.ukp.clarin.webanno.model
    Contain Classes for persistence data models.
    de.tudarmstadt.ukp.clarin.webanno.monitoring.page
    Provides Monitoring functionalities to WebAnno
    de.tudarmstadt.ukp.clarin.webanno.monitoring.support
    Provides Utility Classes for the monitoring, such as Kappa measures
    de.tudarmstadt.ukp.clarin.webanno.webapp.dialog
    Contains a Panel for open dialog.
